Fulin Emperor Shunzhi (1638-1662), second Qing emperor, reigned 1644-1662

sentences.english: Shunzhi of the Qing Dynasty, in the capital of "Man-Han-city living."
sentences.chinese: 清初顺治年间，在京城实行“满汉分城居住”。

sentences.english: Junji the first year of the Qing Dynasty changed its name Wei Jingyuan, Yongzheng was renamed eight years Jingyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 清代顺治元年更名靖远卫，雍正八年改称靖远县。

sentences.english: Finally, under the intervention of emperor Shunzhi, the two robbers were decapitated in the end.
sentences.chinese: 在顺治帝的亲自过问下，终于使二贼伏法。

sentences.english: In conclusion, the political characteristic of Shunzhi Dynasty was summed up simply.
sentences.chinese: 结语部分，对顺治朝政治特点作了简单的小结。
